title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Mozambique 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes GDP growth compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2014 to 2018, slightly increasing from 2018 to 2020, roughly constant from 2020 to 2022, slightly increasing from 2022 to 2023, and finally roughly constant from 2023 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2022 and 2023.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 11.47 was reached at Year 2024
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 1.8 was reached at Year 2019

max_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes GDP growth compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2014 to 2018, slightly increasing from 2018 to 2020, roughly constant from 2020 to 2022, slightly increasing from 2022 to 2023, and finally roughly constant from 2023 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2022 and 2023.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 11.47 was reached at Year 2024
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 1.8 was reached at Year 2019
The line rapidly increased by 235.56% from Year 2019 to 2020, and lastly, increased by 131.0% from Year 2022 to 2023.
